Title: Photo Collage Screensaver
Description: Photo Collage Screensaver is a Windows screensaver written in .NET. It takes pictures from your computer and turns them into a beautiful collage screensaver.
HomeWiki:
Project has moved to https://github.com/digital-lagniappe/photocollage

Project Description
Photo Collage Screensaver is a Windows screensaver written in .NET. It takes pictures from your computer and turns them into a beautiful collage screensaver.



Feature Requests and Discussion
Please submit any suggestions, requests, etc. using the "Issue Tracker" link above or our Facebook page.
